name: Smarter Remarketer
tag_list: marketing, behavioral-marketing, marketing-automation, shopping-cart-abandonment, retail-marketing, email-marketing, remarketing
overview:
Smarter Remarketer collects comprehensive behavioral data. This includes traditional “web analytics” style data, but also a compliment of specialized data required for behavioral marketing best practices. Through Smarter Remarketer’s Metrics feature, the company shows retailers exactly how people are behaving, why they are abandoning and how much revenue is able to be recaptured.

For the first time, retailers can truly understand and monetize the discrete experiences their website visitors are having.

Smarter Remarketer’s marketing automation and intelligence engine makes it easier than ever to engage customers with timely, relevant messages and offers, empowering retailers to drive incremental online revenue lift of 10–20%.

Sophisticated machine learning unites data from multiple sources and makes it immediately actionable, allowing retailers to tune messages that result in higher conversions and increased customer lifetime value.

Smarter Remarketer’s vendor-agnostic technology is used by top retailers including Finish Line, SkyMall and JustFab, working seamlessly with their existing ESPs, display ad partners and web analytics vendors, including Google Analytics.
